parameters.filterByFormula: =FIND(LOWER("{{ $('Candidate Application Form').item.json['Position Applied For'] }}"), LOWER({Job Title})) > 0

options.systemMessage:
=You are a Candidate Screening AI Agent responsible for assessing candidate suitability for specific job positions based on the provided information. 

Objective:
Evaluate the candidate‚Äôs fit for the applied position by analyzing their relevant skills, cover letter, and resume content. Compare this information with the job description and required skills provided by the employer to determine suitability, a match percentage, and screening notes.

Input Fields:

User Side:
- Position applied: The job position the candidate applied for.
- Relevant skills: A list of key skills the candidate possesses.
- Cover letter: Candidate‚Äôs introduction, work experience, and key achievements.
- Resume: Parsed text content extracted from the resume in plain text format.

Employer Side:
- Position description: Detailed job description including responsibilities and expectations.
- Skills required: A list of required skills for the position.

Output Fields:
- Screening Status: One of the following options: "Suitable", "Not Suitable", "Under Review".
- Match Percentage: A numerical score indicating the percentage of relevant skills matching the job requirements.
- Screening Notes: A summary of the assessment, including strengths, areas for improvement, and justification for the screening status.

Instructions:
1. Extract and analyze relevant skills mentioned in the cover letter and resume content.
2. Compare the extracted skills with the job requirements and skills required by the employer.
3. Assign a Match Percentage based on the alignment of skills and experience.
4. Determine the Screening Status based on the skill match and relevance of the candidate‚Äôs experience to the position.
5. Provide comprehensive Screening Notes to justify the assigned status and percentage, highlighting strengths and areas for improvement.

parameters.message:
=We have successfully completed the candidate screening process, and {{ $('Candidate Application Form').item.json['Full Name '] }} has been identified as a suitable candidate for the {{ $('Search Job Posting').item.json['Job Title'] }} position.  

Candidate Details:  
- Position Applied: {{ $('Search Job Posting').item.json['Job Title'] }}  
- Match Percentage: {{ $('Candidate Screener AI Agent').item.json.output.match_percentage }}%  
- Screening Notes: {{ $('Candidate Screener AI Agent').item.json.output.screening_notes }}

Please proceed with the next steps in the interview scheduling process. If you need any further information or clarification, feel free to reach out.  

Thank you,  
Super Awesome HR AI Agent
parameters.subject: =Candidate {{ $('Candidate Application Form').item.json['Full Name '] }} - Suitable for {{ $('Search Job Posting').item.json['Job Title'] }}

parameters.content:
üß† Candidate Screener AI Agent
Uses OpenAI to analyze:
- Resume content vs job requirements
- Skills matching
- Cover letter quality

üìä OUTPUTS:
- Screening Status (Suitable/Not Suitable/Under Review)
- Match Percentage (0-100%)
- Detailed screening notes

## Search Job Posting (Job Matching)
Finds the matching job posting for the applied position

## File Preparation for Airtable Upload

- Upload the file to Google Drive  
- Set the permission to public  
- Format the data to match the format required by Airtable for file uploads

## Merge & Create Candidate

- Merge data from both flows (Candidate Screener AI Agent and File Flow)  
- Use the merged data to create a candidate in Airtable

## Check Candidate & Send Email to HR

- Check if the candidate is qualified or not  
- If the candidate is qualified, the system will send an email to HR

## Candidate Application Form

Web form for candidates to submit applications

Fields:
- Full Name (required)
- Email Address (required, email validation)
- Position Applied For (required)
- Relevant Skills (textarea, required)
- Cover Letter (textarea, required)
- Resume (PDF file upload only)

## SETUP REQUIRED
**Author:** [Billy Christi](https://n8n.io/creators/billy/)

Airtable Base Structure:  
[Copy this Airtable Base](https://airtable.com/appgVjZcaRP8BsKf0/tblla4rBCW3BhPtRO/viw19l5BlEW7NnZJQ)

Required Credentials:  
‚Ä¢ Airtable API Key  
‚Ä¢ OpenAI API Key (GPT-4)  
‚Ä¢ Google Drive Credential
‚Ä¢ Gmail Credential

## ü§ñ AI-Powered Candidate Screening and Evaluation Workflow using OpenAI and Airtable

**What This Template Does:**
- Creates a web form for candidates to submit applications with resume uploads
- Automatically extracts and processes text content from PDF resumes
- Uses GPT-4 AI to intelligently match candidates against job requirements
- Calculates compatibility scores and generates detailed screening notes
- Stores candidate data and resumes in Airtable database and Google Drive
- Automatically emails HR team when suitable candidates are found
- Fully automates the entire hiring pipeline from application to notification

## üìã WORKFLOW PROCESS OVERVIEW
Step 1: üìù Candidate Application Form collects candidate details and PDF resume  
Step 2: üìÑ Extract Resume PDF converts uploaded PDF into readable text  
Step 3: üìÅ Upload File stores resume in Google Drive and sets permissions  
Step 4: üîç Search Job Posting finds matching job in Airtable database  
Step 5: ü§ñ AI Agent (OpenAI) evaluates candidate fit and generates screening results  
Step 6: üíæ Create Candidate stores complete record in Airtable with AI results  
Step 7: ‚úÖ Check Suitability determines if candidate meets requirements  
Step 8: üìß Send Email to HR notifies team when candidate is suitable
